name: Shlice
description:
Slash your way through enemies in Shlice!

- Defend the three lanes by slicing your way through your enemies!

- Earn coins after each run to upgrade your lives and attack!

Credits:

- Upgrade Menu Music: Phoenix (Instrumental) - League of Legends, Cailin Russo, Chrissy Costanza

- Battle Music: First Shot - Infraction

- Player & Enemy Sprite: Azure Striker Gunvolt

Shlice is a game created for a midterm project created by Christopher Chow.
